resources.string: Thanks for using People2Meet. Please accept and sgree to our terms and conditions before proceeding further. Click the below link to read the terms and conditions on our website.
People2Meet will send a one time SMS message to verify your phone number. Carrier SMS charges may apply.

Please confirm your country code and enter your mobile phone number.Do not enter leading zeros for your mobile number. Since People2Meet will automatically detect your SMS in the device youe are using, please enter the phone number of this device.
